messages.subject: Picnic photos & an intro from a newbie
messages.msgSnippet: Ren: I want to hear more about that signature shawl! I called it that because Diana always had a shawl on!!:) I think it was the same one...lovely shades of
messages.messageBody:
"Ren: I want to hear more about that signature shawl!"

I called it that because Diana always had a shawl on!!:) I think it
was the same one...lovely shades of oranges, bright and fiery like her
personality.

My sister actually remembered the shawl after the conference, but
couldn't remember Diana's name and wrote the list to ask about it.
Kelli T (best friends w/Diana's family) answered her back. My sis
ended up hiring Kelli to knit a shawl for her!

So...that's the shawl story, as much as I know of it. I bet Diana
knit it herself.

If you go look at some of the conference pics, there's one of Diana at
margeuritaville in her shawl.:)

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
